detectors.description:

	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#9)

	- Token.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#11)
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#12)
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#13)

detectors.description:
StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#22-29) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#24)
	- balances[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#25)

detectors.description:
StakeHavens.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#79-89) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- totalEthInWei = totalEthInWei + msg.value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#80)
	- amount = msg.value * unitsOneEthCanBuy (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#81)
	- balances[fundsWallet] = balances[fundsWallet] - amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#84)
	- balances[msg.sender] = balances[msg.sender] + amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#85)
detectors.markdown:
[StakeHavens.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#L79-L89) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:

	- [amount = msg.value * unitsOneEthCanBuy](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#L81)

	- [balances[msg.sender] = balances[msg.sender] + amount](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#L85)

detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected ! _spender.call(bytes4(bytes32(sha3()(receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes)))),msg.sender,_value,this,_extraData) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#95):
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#22-29)

	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakeHavens.sol#12)
